text: hi i'm vanessa from speak english with
vanessa dot-com are you available
tomorrow i don't know let me double
check let's talk about it you can't be
certain about everything all the time
it's practically impossible we're all
human everyone has a little bit of
uncertainty or maybe there's things that
you forget we all forget things so what
is a good expression that you can use in
those situations maybe if your coworker
asks you are you available tomorrow or
maybe your friend says hey do you wanna
see a movie tomorrow what can you say if
you don't know what's going on in your
schedule maybe you just forgot you can
use today's expression double check
double check you're gonna check your
schedule again you can simply say oh let
me double check let me double check let
me let me this is natural pronunciation
let me double check let me double check
I don't remember what's on my calendar
for tomorrow you can also use this for
someone else
maybe if someone asks you do you and
your husband wanna go to the movies with
us tomorrow I know that I'm available
but I don't know if he wants to go I can
say let me double check with my husband
let me double check with him if you have
a a partner or a friend or someone else
who you are doing something with they
probably want you to double check with
them before you say yes they can go they
probably want to know what's going on so
you need to double check with them
before you commit them to doing
something this expression double check
is great to use in almost any situation
I need to double check my schedule are
you ready for our lesson tomorrow let me
double check if I already watched and
listened to all the materials I need to
double check this is great so now if you
are not on my website click the link
below this video to use this expression
it's great to know it but you need to
use it so in the link below this video
click on it and answer this question
what is something that you had to double
check what is something that you have to
double check often because you often
forget it we all forget things don't
worry it's okay I have to double check
with my husband if he wants to do
different things with me and our friends
I have to double check my schedule every
day because I don't have it memorized
what do you have to double check I look
forward to seeing your answers and talk
